title: Jam 2021: Internship Experience at the Art Institute of Chicago
short_description: Are you a college or university student curious to hear current Art Institute interns will shed light on what it means to be a part of the museum community?
header_description: This program designed by current Art Institute interns will shed light on what it means to be a part of the museum community.
list_description: Are you a college or university student curious to hear current Art Institute interns will shed light on what it means to be a part of the museum community?
description:
Speakers:

Blake Ashby, Intern, Video, Experience Design
Andrea Yarbrough, Intern, Innovation and Creativity
Jojo Galvan, Intern, Youth and Family
Sara Sukhun, Intern, Visual Design
Charlie Kang, Intern, Indian, Southeast Asian, Himalayan, and Islamic Art

This program is meant for college and university students who want to learn about careers in the museum field from working professionals. Learn more about JAM 2021.
buy_button_caption: This free event is for college and university students only; registration required
